entry.title: avscms/avscms
entry.summary:
avscms

Overview

This is the source of AVSCMS 8.2

AVSCMS's Official website.

Detailed changes are in the changelog.

What is AVSCMS?

AVSCMS! is a Content Management System (CMS) which enables you to build websites and powerful video sharing applications. It is a simple and powerful web server application which requires a server with PHP and either MySQL to run.

You can find full technical requirements here.

AVSCMS! is now free and Open Source software distributed under the GNU General Public License v3.0 or later.
